DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To assess whether anxiety cause task consider anxiogenic , Simulated Public Speaking ( SPS ) test , would change response healthy individual regard physiological vocal parameter . Method : The sample comprise 30 participant gender , 19-42 year old , history psychiatric disorder . The score STAI-Trait enable investigator assign participant two group : LOW ANXIETY ( LA ) HIGH ANXIETY ( HA ) . The investigator evaluate physiological parameter ( heart rate , skin conductance , temperature extremity , electromyogram frontal muscle salivary cortisol ) vocal parameter ( vocal self-evaluation , quality life voice vocal symptom sign ) BEFORE , DURING AFTER SPS .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Physiological Vocal Parameters Volunteers Both Genders Submitted Anxiogenic Task
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 45 year Volunteers psychiatric history diagnosis vocal problem Have minimum average school Chronic smoker Subjects paralysis neurological disease Compromised upper airway time experiment User stimulant , psychotropic drug , herbal medicine , tranquilizer , antidepressant Have drink coffee alcohol day experiment
